products.title: 'Cardiganino' in Cashmere
products.body_html:
"Il cardiganino" - the small cardigan in Italian - is a must have in any woman's closet.

Fitted cardigan sweater in plush cashmere with jersey stitch. Each piece individually finished by hand with a fully fashion neck, front pocket and fine madreperla buttons.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

100% Plush Cashmere

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.title: Anglia Shorts in Cotton
products.body_html:
Menswear-inspired fine cotton boxer shorts with comfort pockets.

The model is 5' 10'' and wearing size S. 

100% Cotton

Made in Italy

products.title: Astrakan Sweater in Baby Alpaca and Wool
products.body_html:
Crafted from a cozy Baby Alpaca yarn base, the Astrakan Sweater is the ideal choice for fall. The slightly boxy fit is enhanced with fully fashioned refined ribbed details at hem, wrist and neck for optimal comfort.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S/M.

46% Baby Alpaca

28% Baby Camel

18% Wool

8% Polyamide

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.title: Britannia Shirt in Cotton
products.body_html:
Menswear-inspired button-up shirt in fine cotton, with exposed placket and classic hem finish.

The model is 5' 10'' and wearing size S. 

100% Cotton

Made in Italy

products.title: Classic Sweater in Cashmere and Wool
products.body_html:
Moderately oversized crewneck sweater in cashmere and wool. Featuring gentle dropped shoulders and refined by ribs on hem and cuffs. Each sweater is individually finished by hand and with a soft lilac dye.

Because of the artisanal hand dye process each sweater will slightly differ.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

10% Cashmere

90% Merino Wool

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.title: Coco Dress in Soft Cotton
products.body_html:
Relaxed silhouette dress with turtleneck, crafted from an organic cotton yarn in a luxurious rib knit. Featuring gently flared hem and a soft texture for a comfortable yet feminine fit through the body.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

68% Organic Cotton

32% Polyamide

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.body_html:
Relaxed cardigan crafted from a textured organic cotton-blend yarn with signature lace knit technique, featuring a comfortable fit through the body, flute hems and gentle bell sleeves.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

80% Organic Cotton

20% Polyamide

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.title: Heritage high neck zip-collar sweater in cashmere
products.body_html:
Comfortable high neck zip-collar sweater in plush cashmere with dropped shoulders, oversized sleeves and refined rib knitting by hand at the hem and cuff.

100% Cashmere

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.title: Heritage pleated miniskirt in cashmere
products.body_html:
Pleated miniskirt in plush cashmere, refined with ribbing at waist for a molded look. Pleats are ironed individually for a couture artisanal feel.

100% Cashmere

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.body_html:

products.title: Legacy Kick Flare Pants in Fine Viscose
products.body_html:
Kick flare pants knitted with a stretchy regenerated-viscose luxury blend and featuring a elegant wide-leg silhouette. Finished by hand with couture detailing: knitted forward pleats and back pockets.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

83% Italian Viscose

17% Elite Polyester

Made in Veneto, Italy

*model is wearing size S

products.title: Magnolia Couture Dress
products.body_html:
Fatto a mano 

An example of exceptional Italian craftsmanship, the Magnolia dress is hand-crocheted by artisans in northern Italy. This full length style takes approximately 125 hours of dedicated work and is assembled from two carefully selected cotton blend yarns to achieve tonal variations and couture feel. It is slightly fitted through the body with a relaxed sleeve silhouette and an open back. 

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

83% Organic Cotton

17% Polyamide

Made in Italy

*due to its unique couture nature this style is a final sale and can also be custom ordered by contacting orders@amiya.com

products.title: Magnolia Couture Top
products.body_html:
Fatto a mano 

An example of exceptional Italian craftsmanship, the Magnolia top is hand-crocheted by artisans in northern Italy. This slightly cropped style takes approximately 40 hours of dedicated work to build and is assembled from two carefully selected cotton blend yarns to achieve tonal variations and couture feel. Features a regular fit through the body with a tie closure at the back neckline. 

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

83% Organic Cotton

17% Polyamide

Made in Italy

*due to its unique couture nature this style is a final sale and can also be custom ordered by contacting orders@amiya.com

products.title: Mosaico Sweater in Wool and Alpaca
products.body_html:
The Mosaico sweater is made from a soft blend of wool yarns and features various different knitting techniques from jersey to basket and bouclé. The tonal rib finishing on hem, wrist and neck pulls together the knit work. All patches are hand finished in Italy. 

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

75% Wool

10% Alpaca

10% Tencel

5% Polyamide

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.body_html:
Chunky sweater in premium wool with irregular texture and oversized crew neckline, refined with ribbed edges at the hem. Fully fashioned and including a matching extra long scarf in jersey knit for a lightweight feel. 

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

100% Wool

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.title: Signature Sweater in Cashmere and Wool
products.body_html:
Menswear-inspired cashmere and wool sweater knitted with our signature ‘interrupted’ chunky cable pattern. Featuring dropped shoulders for a looser fit and refined by ribs on hem and cuffs. Each sweater is individually finished by hand and with a tangerine-rose ombre dye.

Because of the artisanal hand dye process each sweater will slightly differ.

The model is 5' 9'' and wearing size S. 

10% Cashmere

90% Merino Wool

Made in Veneto, Italy

products.body_html:
Tailored pants knitted with a stretchy regenerated-viscose luxury blend and featuring a comfortable elongated silhouette. Finished with a delicate closing rib at hem and couture detailing: front and back strategic pockets refined by hand and structured stitches evoking signature trousers contrast-stitching.

Made in Veneto, Italy
